name: Soviet David Hilberman
description:
David Hilberman, animator at Disney, was let go on wrong accusations of being a communist by no-one less then Walt Disney himself. This game is based on a true story. You can use WASD to move, (W and Space are jump) and you can use the mouse to draw platforms. You must reach the lightgreen square each level.

Created for Pizza jam 2018 by Julius de Blaaij.
